learning_outcomes.description: Understand proofs of deep results in single variable real analysis. Students should be able to provide proofs of results close to those covered in class, with an appropriate level of detail and rigour. Moreover, students should demonstrate substantive content knowledge of single variable real analysis.

Understand constructions in multivariable real analysis. Students should be able to provide proofs of results close to those covered in class, with an appropriate level of detail and rigour. Moreover, students should demonstrate substantive content knowledge of multiple variable real analysis.

assessments.task_description: There will be three assignments, each worth 8.33%.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Assignments should be submitted online using Gradescope
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Quiz 1 will be on Thursday 22 August during class time.
